text: Ge Cuilin (1930 â€“ 27 December 2022) was a Chinese children's writer and poet from Wuxi. Ge won with multipe fairy tales the National Outstanding Children's Literature Award during the first (1980-1985), third (1992-1994) and seventh (2004-2006) awards. A puppet film was made of her fairy tale "Wild Grape" and won the 1986 Munich TV Festival Youth TV Program Award. Ge died on 27 December 2022, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:Children's writers Category:20th-century Chinese writers Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Place of death missing
title: Ge Cuilin
